name: OpenRA
notes:
Requires Mono to be installed on your system: https://www.mono-project.com/download/stable/#download-lin or try "sudo apt install mono-devel"

OpenRA will not launch and crash on boot without it.
content:
exe: OpenRA-Red-Alert-x86_64.AppImage
files:
- file1: https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/releases/download/release-20190314/OpenRA-Red-Alert-x86_64.AppImage
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: file1
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/OpenRA-Red-Alert-x86_64.AppImage
system:
  disable_runtime: true
